Breakwater
+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food on all Coast tiles for this city. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for all Reef features for this city.
Boardwalk

+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith on all adjacent tiles. Additional +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, and +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food if the tile has a Sea feature or has Breathtaking appeal.
Arsenal

A district for naval military facilities. Also removes the [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty for embarking and disembarking to and from this tile. Must be built on Coast or Lake Terrain adjacent to land. Cannot be built on Reef.
Warehouse
+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. [NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed).
Drydock

+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Produciton for all unimproved Coast tiles in this city. Additional +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production if adjacent to the Arsenal. [NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed). [NEWLINE]Allows the Military Engineer unit to be trained in this city.
Naval Academy

+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. Allows Fleets and Armadas to be trained directly. Fleet and Armada training costs reduced 25%. [NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed).

+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on all Fishing Boat improvements for this city. +2 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing if this city is adjacent to coast. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity, if this city does not yet have a Market building.

Bonus [ICON_Production] Production equal to the adjacency bonus of the Harbor district. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on all Fishing Boat improvements for this city. +6 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city.
+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on all Coast tiles for this city. Additional +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on all Coast tiles with an improved resource for this city.
Receive a second naval unit each time you train a naval unit. Must be built on a Coast tile that is adjacent to an Arsenal district.
Must be built on the Coast, adjacent to land and a Waterfront district.
Military Academies, Naval Academies, and Renaissance Walls generate +2 [ICON_Science] Science.
+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each Research Lab, Military Academy, Naval Academy, Coal Power Plant, Oil Power Plant, and Nuclear Power Plant.
